Class FeatureHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.jagacy.ui.FeatureHelper

public class FeatureHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Determines the attributes of a feature.

Since:
Jagacy 3270 1.4, Jagacy VT 1.1
Author:
Robert M. Preston
